/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a tranquil scene of a tree-lined street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the image. The trees, with their lush green leaves, stand tall on both sides of the street, creating a natural canopy overhead. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a vibrant contrast to the greenery below. On the right side of the street, there's a building with a red roof, adding a pop of color to the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the textures and colors of the surroundings.
